title: The Mardini
sub_head: Burak Ayaz, the owner of Fahri Konsolos bar in the trendy Moda neighborhood on the Asian side of Istanbul, named this cocktail for the Southeastern city of Mardin.
body:
To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
Pro tip: The leftover sumac syrup can be substituted for simple syrup in a whiskey sour, giving it what Mr. Ayaz calls “a Mesopotamian twist.”
